amendatorysection.catchline: Attachment; judgment for defendant; effect; return of property or proceeds.
amendatorysection.para: If judgment is rendered in the action for the defendant, the attachment shall be discharged, and the property attached, or its proceeds, shall be returned to him.

annotation.para: Order discharging garnishee ipso facto discharges attachment. Alpirn v. Goodman, 3 Neb. Unof. 397, 91 N.W. 530 (1902).
